file_content.text: Hello, Captain. Thanks for making your way all the way out there.
Your work on Balmorra was superb. The Military Expenditure Committee has even stopped harassing me about my "crazy" privateer idea.
And let me apologize up-front. Hoth is hardly one of the galaxy's top vacation spots.
Just drop the whole thing in a big Corellian whiskey, and it's fine.
Hoth's not so bad.
I'll toast to that.
I'm picturing banthaskin rugs, a roaring fire....
[Flirt] Why not?
So this is the Republic woman you serve. Now I see why.
And this is the orphan Mandalorian you picked up. Nice souvenir.
And a slavering wampa charging in to eat you both. You're right, that is a nice image....
I don't think she likes you.
Huddling under furs, sharing body heat... if it wasn't for the Imperial bombardments, it'd be paradise.
It's been kind of fun being on the side of truth and justice.
You can count on me.
Or at least the Republic, hmm?
Just tell me what to expect.
Get to the briefing.
Here are the facts: Until a few years ago, Hoth was a frozen wasteland with zero habitation except the occasional pirate ship.
Which would still be the case if we hadn't lost our most advanced secret fleet in an ambush above it.
With the number of ships that went down, we and the Imperials are both stuck here, battling it out to claim this rotten ice slick.
I guess someone in the Republic can't keep a secret.
Loose lips lose ships.
We never found the leak. But that's not the most embarrassing part.
Ships are coming in; why can't the Republic leave?
I don't understand.
If we let the Empire claim our lost fleet, we're out thousands of man-hours of prototype technology. But that's not why you're here.
Battlefield tactics aren't really my specialty.
Why send me?
That's not why you're here.
Right now, neither the Republic nor the Empire claims Hoth's airspace. We were driven out... by some witless pirates called the White Maw.
Somehow these outlaws have acquired such a supremely advanced cloaking technology that they can outmaneuver both the Republic and the Empire.
Score one for the little guy!
Good for them!
The White Maw are hardly little.
Who are these guys? Why haven't I heard of them?
Tell me about the White Maw.
The SIS says they're known in the Outer Rim, mostly for their brutality. They like to pull "blowouts"--open a freighter to hard vacuum to jettison the contents... and crew.
So you want me to steal the cloaker from them.
And the Republic wants it.
Beg... buy... borrow... steal. We're not picky.
This cloaking device, whatever it is, makes their ships basically invisible to instruments. We can't see them coming. We can't stop them. And neither can the Empire.
We need this device, and we need you to get it for us.
I can't promise not to accidentally blow up the planet in the process. You wouldn't believe my luck.
I'm in if you want me.
It's the galaxy's least useful talent. Learn to play the Republic anthem in your belly button or something, okay?
You've never blown up a planet, Captain. Yourself a few times....
Ha.
I don't remember you mentioning this.
I'll warn our commanders not to leave out anything fragile.
You didn't say "please."
[Flirt] Ask me nicely.
Oh? Are you the kind of man who likes to hear a woman beg?
Please....
Yes. Is that the pathetic kind of girl you're looking for?
What have we got so far?
The pirates don't like outsiders. That's about as much as our trooper boys have managed.
You're not going to sweeten the pot?
What's in it for me?
All we want is the tech. Anything else you find... make your own plans how to dispose of it.
When you get planetside, speak to Major Panin. He'll be your point-of-contact and tell you anything else you need to know.
